comment: A necessary and sufficient condition (that holds when ` T ` is a Hermitian operator) for an eigenvalue ` B ` to be real. Generalization of Equation 1.30 of [Hughes] p. 49. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jan-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
